title: If you could only watch one movie before the end of humanity, what would it be and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I like What about Bob? Why, well at my lowest moment in life, I went with only 5 dollars in my pocket and saw it at the show. It was a matinee so it didn't cost much, and I never laughed so hard and felt 100% better afterwards. The moral of the movie helped me as well, here is someone who has some very serious issues, and how he through living, and just by taking a vacation from life was able to break through all of his issues, and comically at the same time the doctor has a breakdown while dealing with him. Don't take life so seriously.
I assume I'm selecting from movies I've already seen. I might go with the beautiful “Seeking a Friend for the End of the World.” It's a story of creating meaning before a final, meaningless event.
